ygData.subject: Re: Tron RPG
ygData.msgSnippet: The quiz would take CGI scripts, and I don t know if Angelfire supports it. There are other sites that make and hosts CGI scripts for you, though.

supports it. There are other sites that make and hosts CGI scripts 
for you, though.
